plot: A man and his son visit a nightclub in the Mexican-U.S. border to confront an old conflict of adultery and murder, and to finish a children's book with a medieval theme.
title: El paje
plot_es: A man and his son visit a nightclub in the Mexican-U.S. border to confront an old conflict of adultery and murder, and to finish a children's book with a medieval theme.
plot_en: A man and his son visit a nightclub in the Mexican-U.S. border to confront an old conflict of adultery and murder, and to finish a children's book with a medieval theme.
